org.forgerock.openicf.common.rpc

Interface RequestDistributor<G extends RemoteConnectionGroup<G,H,P>,H extends RemoteConnectionHolder<G,H,P>,P extends RemoteConnectionContext<G,H,P>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLoadBalancingAlgorithm, ClientRemoteConnectorInfoManager, ConnectionPrincipal, FailoverLoadBalancingAlgorithm, OpenICFWebSocketApplication.SinglePrincipal, OpenICFWebSocketCreator.SinglePrincipal, RemoteConnectionGroup, RoundRobinLoadBalancingAlgorithm, WebSocketConnectionGroup

    public interface RequestDistributor<G extends RemoteConnectionGroup<G,H,P>,H extends RemoteConnectionHolder<G,H,P>,P extends RemoteConnectionContext<G,H,P>>
    A RequestDistributor delivers the RemoteRequest to the connected endpoint.

    The RemoteRequestFactory is used to create a RemoteConnectionContext aware RemoteRequest which will be delivered.

    The implementation may hold multiple transmission channels and try all to deliver the message before if fails.

    The failed delivery signaled with null empty to avoid the expensive Throw and Catch especially when many implementation are chained together.

    See Also:
    FailoverLoadBalancingAlgorithm, RoundRobinLoadBalancingAlgorithm, RemoteConnectionGroup

    • Method Detail

      • trySubmitRequest

        <R extends RemoteRequest<V,E,G,H,P>,V,E extends Exception> R trySubmitRequest(RemoteRequestFactory<R,V,E,G,H,P> requestFactory)
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of RemoteRequest
        V - The type of the task's result, or Void if the task does not return anything (i.e. it only has side-effects).
        E - The type of the exception thrown by the task if it fails, or NeverThrowsException if the task cannot fail.
        Parameters:
        requestFactory - the factory to create the RemoteRequest
        Returns:
        new promise if succeeded otherwise null.

      • isOperational

        boolean isOperational()
        Check if this implementation is operational.
        Returns:
        true is operational and ready the submit RemoteRequestFactory otherwise false.
